title: data_tampering
label: Data Tampering
description: Alerts indicating unauthorized modifications or alterations to data, potentially compromising data integrity and security.

srcGeoAddress.example: 123 Main Street, San Jose, CA 95131, United States

destGeoAddress.example: 456 Microsoft Way, Redmond, CA 98052, United States

ruleName.example: Unauthorized Data Modification - secure_settings.ini Overwrite via Backup Service

relateInfo.example: Unauthorized overwrite of secure_settings.ini configuration file from backup service admin_backup account.

requestHeader.example:
POST /backup/secure_settings.ini?action=overwrite&timestamp=1692113422 HTTP/1.1
Host: srv-backup01.contoso.local
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/115.0.5790.110 Safari/537.36
Accept: */*
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.9
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 8
X-Forwarded-For: 192.168.1.150, 203.0.113.5
Referer: https://internal.contoso.local/admin/backup_management.php
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJhZG1pbl9iYWNrdXAiLCJuYW1lIjoiQWRtaW5pc3RyYXRvciIsImlhdCI6MTY5MjExMzQyMiwiZXhwIjoxNjkyMTE3MDIyfQ.SflKxwRJSMeKKF2QT4fwpMeJf36POk6yJV_adQssw5c
X-Client-IP: 192.168.1.150
X-Real-IP: 203.0.113.5

responseHeader.example:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Tue, 15 Aug 2023 14:30:45 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.41 (Win64) OpenSSL/1.1.1k
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 15
Connection: close
X-Powered-By: PHP/7.4.3
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: POST, GET, OPTIONS
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Authorization, X-Client-IP, X-Real-IP
X-Request-ID: b4b5a7e2-3f8a-4e15-9c8d-1e2f3a4b5c6d
X-Response-Time: 0.023s

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/115.0.5790.110 Safari/537.36
